name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Skilled Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in **React**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries. Demonstrated expertise in **frontend development** and adept at optimizing UI/UX, utilizing testing libraries for quality assurance, and enhancing application performance through profiling and optimization.

Possess a full-stack mindset with hands-on experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with backend technologies such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record of cross-team collaboration and mentoring junior developers, contributing to open-source projects, and effectively communicating technical concepts through public speaking and written communication.

Experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms with real-time processing capabilities, proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines in line with industry standards. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, ensuring solutions align with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
